abilities.name: SET
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Unown S, Unown E, and Unown T on your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for an Energy card, show it your opponent, and put it on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
